lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department reported a 0.1 percent increase in stockpiles in December, the smallest gain since a similar 0.1 percent rise in July 2013.

headline.main: Slower Growth Shown in Data on Inventories
headline.print_headline: Slower Growth Shown in Data On Inventories

snippet: The Commerce Department reported a 0.1 percent increase in stockpiles in December, the smallest gain since a similar 0.1 percent rise in July 2013.
